tool_description: Get detailed information about the living expenses of 650+ cities around the world.
name: Cities Cost of Living
title: Cities Cost of Living

api_list.name: Get Currencies List
api_list.description: Get a list of all the Currencies available
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cities-cost-of-living1.p.rapidapi.com/get_currencies_list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cities-cost-of-living1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
